snippet: Armed only with his books, Gene Sharp has helped spread peace around the world for four decades.
abstract: Profile of author Gene Sharp, founder of non-profit Albert Einstein Institution in Boston; Sharp is widely regarded as the godfather of nonviolent revolution, and his book From Dictatorship to Democracy, available on the Internet in 24 languages, was as influential to would-be revolutionaries during last year’s Arab Spring as any other text.
lead_paragraph: Armed only with his books, Gene Sharp has helped spread peace around the world for four decades.
